channel.title: Comments for Best Recipes Around The World

item.title: Comment on Will’s Potato Salad Recipe by Ann Marie Solberg
item.dc:creator: Ann Marie Solberg
item.description: I had Will's German Potato Salad at a church dinner this past weekend and it was the best I ever tasted. If possible, please send me the recipe.
item.content:encoded:
I had Will’s German Potato Salad at a church dinner this past weekend and it was the best I ever tasted.
If possible, please send me the recipe.

item.title: Comment on 34772197983_f7b198a5db_b.jpg by Marko Smith
item.dc:creator: Marko Smith
item.description: I LOVE ME SOME JUNGLE JUICE…THIS JUICE HERR IS THE BEST JUICE MADE…I HAVEN’T SEEN JUICE MADE LIKE THIS EVER
item.content:encoded: I LOVE ME SOME JUNGLE JUICE…THIS JUICE HERR IS THE BEST JUICE MADE…I HAVEN’T SEEN JUICE MADE LIKE THIS EVER

item.title: Comment on Very Fluffy Slime by Matilda
item.dc:creator: Matilda
item.description: Your slime Is The Best Ever
